price: 68. Dan barang siapa Kami panjangkan umurnya niscaya Kami kembalikan dia kepada awal kejadian(nya).*(725) Maka mengapa mereka tidak mengerti?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: *725). Kembali menjadi lemah dan kurang akal, seperti anak kecil.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
